alert.note: Alert for Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 8:43PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Meade County through 915 PM MDT... At 843 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Elm Springs, or 36 miles northeast of Rapid City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elm Springs around 900 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly.
